description: This file defines a Java class named UtilityPaymentRequest used as a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for utility payment requests, containing fields for provider ID, amount, reference number, and account.

classes.name: UtilityPaymentRequest
classes.description: A DTO class representing a utility payment request with relevant payment details.

methods.name: getProviderId
methods.description: Getter for providerId (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).

methods.name: setProviderId
methods.description: Setter for providerId (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).

methods.name: getAmount
methods.description: Getter for amount (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).

methods.name: setAmount
methods.description: Setter for amount (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).

methods.name: getReferenceNumber
methods.description: Getter for referenceNumber (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).

methods.name: setReferenceNumber
methods.description: Setter for referenceNumber (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).

methods.name: getAccount
methods.description: Getter for account (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).

methods.name: setAccount
methods.description: Setter for account (generated by Lombok @Data annotation).
